name: Disclosures of records of Hawaii financial institutions
text: §412:2-603  Disclosures of records of Hawaii financial institutions.  Any institution-affiliated party who, without authorization, knowingly discloses, except in the regular course of business, any information derived from a Hawaii financial institution's records shall be guilty of a misdemeanor punishable pursuant to sections 706-663 and 706-640. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
